body_html: Agreed, I prefer try/catching rather than adding args to the API. Otherwise looks great. Probably worth adding a test of the core functionality (without necessarily creating a 2GiB array)
body_text: Agreed, I prefer try/catching rather than adding args to the API.  Otherwise looks great.  Probably worth adding a test of the core functionality (without necessarily creating a 2GiB array)
body: Agreed, I prefer try/catching rather than adding args to the API.  Otherwise looks great.  Probably worth adding a test of the core functionality (without necessarily creating a 2GiB array)
